name: Forest Horse Jumping 3D Free
description:
***Take the most realistic ride on horse in top best adventuring forest 3d environments***

Forest horse jumping is all about jumping and guiding your horse to overcome obstacles coming on your way. Take your horse and set out for a wild ride on horse. Game includes 6 huge challenging tracks for horse riding and jumping. Thrilling horse jumping missions are waiting for u. Practice more to clear tough levels. This game will show your ability to control horse as you traverse your way over obstacles. Fun controls and Addictive game play for hours of great realistic horse simulation and entertainment.

How to Play:
- horse will auto move.
- Tap on jump button to jump over obstacles located right bottom of your apple iphone ipad device.
- Jump at appropriate time to collect coins.
- Clear levels to unveil new environments new tracks and much more.

Features:
- top ios free offline horse simulation game.
- Supports all apple devices.
- realistic 3d graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing control and effects.
- 6 exciting missions.
- top survival challenge now on your smart ipad.
- User friendly GUI and controls.
- Multiple camera angles.
- Support for hd iphone, ipad devices.
- Good quality sound effects.
- best downloading horse simulation game in apple gaming world.
